snippet.title: Monstronome - VR Game - Full Gameplay Walkthrough [FR/EN] - December 2020
snippet.description:
0:00 - Intro
0:29 - Tutorial
5:17 - Guided Mode
11:32 - Free Mode

GAMEPLAY TRAILER HERE: https://youtu.be/lzW2OqENsHM

Hurry up, this is the commemorative concert!

You are the Monstronome, a Metronomagus.

With your Magic Baton and the Metronomicon, you'll have to harmonize Instrumonsters with some technical gestures.

Monstronome is a musical management VR game. Act like a conductor and manage your Instrumonsters in order to do a great concert.
____________________________________________________________
This game is a student project for the Cnam-Enjmin first year Master's Degree. It was made in 3 months.

Download game on Itch : https://lemouf.itch.io/monstronome

Follow us on Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/monstronome/
